project.description: Built VC sourcing infrastructure and ML pipelines for startup signal detection.
impact: Created 10,000+ sourced leads with 20%+ investor conversation rate
Built scoring models with 30+ non-public features
Implemented LLMs to extract entities and improve search relevance

project.description: Led large-scale data science and engineering orgs focused on automation, scaling, and intelligence gathering.
impact: Increased data coverage by 60%, reduced headcount by ⅓

Built the automated sourcing engine pre-LLM tools
